comment: Smart Data Models - Noise Pollution adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Environment/master/NoisePollution/schema.json
description: Noise Pollution data model merges specific and punctual noise measurements (coming, e.g. from NoiseLevelObservation entities) into average parameters referred to city areas, providing a more city-related data about noise pollution status and evolution.

contents.name: LAeq2
contents.comment: Average sound level over the last 2 hours

contents.name: LAmax2
contents.comment: Maximum sound level recorded for the last 2 hours

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: buildingsType
contents.comment: Type of predominant buildings within the measurement area at installation of the sensor

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateObservedFrom
contents.comment: Observation period start date and time

contents.name: dateObservedTo
contents.comment: End date and time of the observation period

contents.name: groundType
contents.comment: Type of predominant ground in the measurement area at installation of the sensor

contents.name: noiseAnnoyanceIndex
contents.comment: Index (1 to 10) according to noise annoyance level

contents.name: noiseOrigin
contents.comment: Main origin (source) of the recorded noise at installation of the sensor

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: wallsType
contents.comment: Facade material types dominant in the measurement area at installation of the sensor

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)
